row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.JOB.GENERATE_TESTSET_REPORT@GENERIC
row.description: Generate a test set report of previously executed UFT test set

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION ! Logging input parameters :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "HPQC HOST URL" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Auth Token" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Domain Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Project Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Test Set Folder Path" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_FOLDER_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Test Set Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_OUTPUT_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#, "TestSetReport-") :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_OUTPUT_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_OUTPUT_FILE_PATH#, &$RUNID#) :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_OUTPUT_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_OUTPUT_FILE_PATH#, ".pdf")
:SET &UC4RB_HPQC_INPUT_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#, "reportXml-") :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_INPUT_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_INPUT_FILE_PATH#, &$RUNID#) :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_INPUT_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_INPUT_FILE_PATH#, ".xml")
! Action name :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME# = "GENERATE_REPORT_TESTSET" ! Define java options and values :DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#, string, 18
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "-domain" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[7] = "-project" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[8] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[9] = "-testsetfolderpath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_FOLDER_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[10] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[11] = "-testsetname" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[12] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[13] = "-inputfilepath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_INPUT_FILE_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[14] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[15] = "-outputfilepath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_OUTPUT_FILE_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[16] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[17] = "-authtokenid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[18] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
java -jar &UC4RB_HPQC_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** GENERATE TESTSET REPORT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** GENERATE TESTSET REPORT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Printing messages as per Error code and exit accordingly. :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.HPQC_SETTING_AUTH_TOKENS
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# = 0 :SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_REPORT_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#, "TestSetReport-") :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_REPORT_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_REPORT_PATH#, &$RUNID#) :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_REPORT_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_REPORT_PATH#, ".pdf")
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_REPORT_PATH#,,"TOP" :ENDIF
